summary: It adds more homes to Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
It adds more homes to Skyrim.

--------------------
Version 1.0   |
--------------------
Is a mixture of my old Riverwood Home and a new home Mountain Shack - in which I had to landscape edit to fit it on - And in more versions to come will add home all over Skyrim.

----------------
Instalation |
----------------
Auto - Use Nexus Mod Manager

Manual - Open the .zip and put the Data folder into your skyrim directory. (should know where it is)
-------------
To Do   |
-------------
Add a Map Marker for the Mountain Shack.
Add another room to Riverwood Home.
Add Clutter to Mountain Shack.
author: madman12002
